RESEARCH EXPERIENCE

INL Laboratory

Lyon, France
Oct 2012 - Present
  • Fabricated anti-reflective coating structure for solar cell by using laser interference lithography, reactive-ion etching, wet etching, etc.
  • Developed Rigorous Coupled Wave Analysis (RCWA) Matlab code with object-oriented programming (OOP) method to model anti-reflective coating nanostructure for solar cell.
  • Developed Finite Difference Frequency Domain (FDFD) Matlab code to model electromagnetic wave behavior in 2D photonic crystal structure.
  • Developed Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) and Genetic Algorithm (GA) code to auto-design the photonic crystal structure.
  • Proposed and developed a novel method to auto-design diffraction grating to enhance photon control.
  • Simulated laser interference lithography process.

CIOMP, Chinese Academy of Science

ChangChun, P.R.China
Sept 2009 - Jan 2012
  • Used upconversion nanoparticles as a new fluorescent probe to build fiber-optic biosensor.
